title: Todays’ power cut schedule
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission (PUCSL) has announced the following power cut schedule for today.
In the areas P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W the power cut will be for two hours from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. and one hour and fifteen minutes from 5 p.m. to 10 p.m.
In areas A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K and L there will be a power cut of three hour and twenty minutes from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. and one hour and forty minutes from 6 p.m. to 11 p.m.
